article.description: Hot-shooting St. Peter's rolls past Boston U 70-59
article.headline: Hot-shooting St. Peter's rolls past Boston U 70-59
article.linkText: Hot-shooting St. Peter's beats Boston U, 70-59
article.story:
BOSTON -- Marvin Dominique had 22 points with 10 rebounds, Trevis Wyche dished out 10 assists and Saint Peter's defeated Boston U 70-59 on Saturday.

Quadir Welton chipped in 16 points with eight boards for the Peacocks (3-6), who shot a scorching 61.4 percent from the field. Dominique hit five of St. Peter's 11 3-pointers.

Tyler Gaskins and Travis Hester each scored nine points and Wyche had seven, contributing to a balanced scoring effort.

Hester and Dominique each hit a pair of 3-pointers as the Peacocks extended a five-point lead early in the half to 20 at the break. Wyche's 3-pointer made it 49-24 early in the second and St. Peter's coasted from there.

Eric Fanning led the Terriers (2-5) with 17 points and seven rebounds. Cedric Hankerson added 15 and Nathan Dieudonne had 10 with six boards. Boston was held to 19-of-48 shooting (39.6 percent)

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
